testcase.name: runScenario["Verify that new customer can be added successfully", "New customer"](1)

failure.message: Cannot find email address expected [true] but found [false]

testcase.failure: java.lang.AssertionError: Cannot find email address expected [true] but found [false] at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:110) at org.testng.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:1413) at org.testng.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:56) at StepsDefinition.newCustomerSteps.customer_unique_email_address_should_reflect_in_customers_list(newCustomerSteps.java:110) at ✽.customer unique email address should reflect in customers list(file:///C:/Users/lerato.motshabi/NewSpace/CucumberFramework.nopCommerce/src/test/resources/features/addNewCustomerSteps.feature:34)
testcase.system-out:
Scenario: Verify that new customer can be added successfully # src/test/resources/features/addNewCustomerSteps.feature:26 Given user can login to nopCommerce dashboard # StepsDefinition.newCustomerSteps.user_can_login_to_nop_commerce_dashboard() And user is in customers page # StepsDefinition.newCustomerSteps.user_is_in_customers_page() When user clicks add new button # StepsDefinition.newCustomerSteps.user_clicks_add_new_button() And user enters "<email>" in email # StepsDefinition.newCustomerSteps.user_enters_in_email(java.lang.String) Roloe is Registered And user enters guest or registered in customer role # StepsDefinition.newCustomerSteps.user_enters_guest_or_registered_in_customer_role() And user clicks save button # StepsDefinition.newCustomerSteps.user_clicks_save_button() Then MESSAGE The new customer has been added successfully. MUST DISPLAY # StepsDefinition.newCustomerSteps.message_the_new_customer_has_been_added_successfully_must_display() And customer unique email address should reflect in customers list # StepsDefinition.newCustomerSteps.customer_unique_email_address_should_reflect_in_customers_list() java.lang.AssertionError: Cannot find email address expected [true] but found [false] at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:110) at org.testng.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:1413) at org.testng.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:56) at StepsDefinition.newCustomerSteps.customer_unique_email_address_should_reflect_in_customers_list(newCustomerSteps.java:110) at ✽.customer unique email address should reflect in customers list(file:///C:/Users/lerato.motshabi/NewSpace/CucumberFramework.nopCommerce/src/test/resources/features/addNewCustomerSteps.feature:34)
And user clicks logout button # StepsDefinition.loginSteps.user_clicks_logout_button()

failure.message: You are not in admin Page expected [Dashboard / nopCommerce administration12345] but found [Dashboard / nopCommerce administration]
